title: ABOUT KOH SAMUI
description: Learn about Koh Samui’s history, culture, beaches, and attractions. Discover why this Thai island is a must-visit destination.

title: KOH SAMUI TRAVEL TIPS
description: Plan your trip with essential Koh Samui travel tips on transport, budgeting, safety, and the best time to visit.

title: KOH SAMUI WEATHER
description: Check Koh Samui’s weather guide for seasonal temperatures, rainy seasons, and the best time for beach activities.

title: PUBLIC HOLIDAYS & FESTIVALS
description: Discover Koh Samui’s public holidays and festivals, including Songkran, Loy Krathong, and local cultural celebrations throughout the year.

title: LANGUAGE TIPS
description: Learn key Thai phrases for greetings, shopping, dining, and emergencies to help you communicate in Koh Samui.

title: CURRENCY & MONEY EXCHANGE
description: Get tips on exchanging money, using ATMs, and handling payments in Koh Samui while avoiding fees and bad exchange rates.

title: BAN TAI
description: Ban Tai in Koh Samui is a peaceful area with beautiful beaches, local charm, and easy access to top island attractions.

title: BANG KAO
description: Bang Kao in Koh Samui is known for its quiet beaches, coconut groves, and authentic local atmosphere away from the crowds.

title: BANG POR
description: Bang Por in Koh Samui offers tranquil beaches, fresh seafood restaurants, and stunning ocean views with a relaxed atmosphere.

title: BANGRAK
description: Bangrak, or Big Buddha Beach, is a lively area in Koh Samui with great dining, ferry access, and views of the famous Big Buddha statue.

title: BOPHUT
description: Bophut in Koh Samui is home to Fisherman’s Village, offering charming streets, beachfront dining, and a laid-back atmosphere.

title: CHAWENG
description: Chaweng is Koh Samui’s most vibrant area, featuring a lively nightlife, stunning beaches, and a variety of restaurants and resorts.

title: CHAWENG NOI
description: Chaweng Noi in Koh Samui is a quieter, upscale alternative to Chaweng, with soft sand, clear waters, and luxurious resorts.

title: CHOENG MON
description: Choeng Mon in Koh Samui is a peaceful beachside area with calm waters, ideal for families and those seeking relaxation.

title: HUA THANON
description: Hua Thanon in Koh Samui is a traditional fishing village with a unique cultural vibe, fresh seafood, and a serene beach.

title: LAMAI
description: Lamai in Koh Samui is a lively beach town offering a mix of nightlife, water sports, stunning coastline, and local attractions.

title: LIPA NOI
description: Lipa Noi in Koh Samui is a quiet, family-friendly area with beautiful beaches, shallow waters, and breathtaking sunsets.

title: MAENAM
description: Maenam in Koh Samui is a relaxed beach destination known for its golden sand, boutique resorts, and stunning views of Koh Phangan.

title: NA MUANG
description: Na Muang in Koh Samui is famous for its stunning waterfalls, jungle landscapes, and adventure activities like elephant sanctuaries.

title: NATHON
description: Nathon is Koh Samui’s main port town, offering local markets, ferry access, and a glimpse of authentic Thai island life.

title: PLAI LAEM
description: Plai Laem in Koh Samui is a peaceful coastal area known for its temples, beautiful beaches, and proximity to Big Buddha.

title: TALING NGAM
description: Taling Ngam in Koh Samui is a secluded paradise with lush jungles, luxury resorts, and stunning sunset views over the Gulf of Thailand.

title: THONG KRUT
description: Thong Krut in Koh Samui is a small fishing village with boat tours, seafood restaurants, and peaceful coastal scenery.

title: BAN TAI BEACH
description: Discover Ban Tai Beach, a quiet stretch of golden sand with calm waters, perfect for relaxation and family-friendly getaways in Koh Samui.

title: BANG KAO BEACH
description: Bang Kao Beach offers a peaceful, untouched coastline in Koh Samui, ideal for quiet walks, scenic views, and a true escape from the crowds.

title: BANG POR BEACH
description: Explore Bang Por Beach, a hidden gem in Koh Samui with soft sand, shallow waters, and excellent beachfront dining with stunning sunset views.

title: BIG BUDDAH BEACH (BANGRAK BEACH)
description: Big Buddha Beach, also known as Bangrak Beach, is a great spot in Koh Samui for boat trips, sunsets, and stunning views of Big Buddha temple.

title: BOPHUT BEACH
description: Bophut Beach in Koh Samui combines a relaxed atmosphere with the charm of Fisherman’s Village, offering beachfront dining and boutiques.

title: CHAWENG BEACH
description: Chaweng Beach is Koh Samui’s most famous beach, featuring soft white sand, clear waters, vibrant nightlife, endless dining and entertainment.

title: CHAWENG NOI BEACH
description: Chaweng Noi Beach offers a quieter alternative to Chaweng Beach, with soft sand, calm waters, and a more peaceful, upscale beach experience.

title: CHOENG MON BEACH
description: Choeng Mon Beach in Koh Samui is a tranquil paradise, perfect for swimming, relaxing, and enjoying its shallow waters and soft golden sand.

title: CORAL COVE BEACH
description: Coral Cove Beach is a small, hidden cove in Koh Samui with crystal-clear waters, great snorkeling, and a peaceful escape from the crowds.

title: HUA THANON BEACH
description: Hua Thanon Beach is a quiet, traditional area of Koh Samui, known for its fishing village, local culture, peaceful and undeveloped shoreline.

title: LAEM SET BEACH
description: Laem Set Beach in Koh Samui is a secluded paradise with unique rock formations, shallow waters, and a peaceful, tropical setting.

title: LAEM YAI BEACH
description: Laem Yai Beach offers stunning sunsets and a quiet retreat in Koh Samui, perfect for those seeking tranquility and natural beauty.

title: LAMAI BEACH
description: Lamai Beach is Koh Samui’s second-largest beach, known for its lively vibe, stunning coastline, water sports, and relaxed beachfront dining.

title: LIPA NOI BEACH
description: Lipa Noi Beach in Koh Samui is a peaceful, family-friendly beach with shallow waters, soft sand, and breathtaking sunset views.

title: MAENAM BEACH
description: Maenam Beach is a long, quiet stretch of golden sand in Koh Samui, ideal for relaxation, beachfront resorts, and stunning ocean views.
Nathon Beach in Koh Samui offers a quiet retreat with stunning sunsets, local seafood restaurants, and easy access to ferries.

title: PANG KA BEACH
description: Pang Ka Beach is a hidden, undeveloped beach in Koh Samui, offering a peaceful retreat, shallow waters, and untouched natural beauty.

title: PLAI LAEM BEACH
description: Plai Laem Beach in Koh Samui is a quiet, scenic beach near the famous Big Buddha, with beautiful views and a peaceful atmosphere.
Rocky Beach (Hin Ta Hin Yai) in Koh Samui is famous for its rock formations, stunning coastal views, and local legend.

title: SILVER BEACH
description: Silver Beach, also called Crystal Bay, is one of Koh Samui’s most beautiful beaches, with soft white sand and clear turquoise waters.

title: TALING NGAM BEACH
description: Taling Ngam Beach in Koh Samui is a secluded paradise with stunning sunset views, a quiet atmosphere, and breathtaking scenery.

title: THONGSON BAY
description: Thongson Bay is a quiet, hidden beach in Koh Samui, perfect for those seeking a peaceful escape with soft sand and calm waters.

title: LAEM SOR PAGODA
description: Laem Sor Pagoda in Koh Samui is a golden temple by the sea, offering a peaceful atmosphere and stunning ocean views.

title: SECRET BUDDHA GARDEN
description: Secret Buddha Garden in Koh Samui is a hidden hillside sanctuary with mystical statues, lush greenery, and breathtaking views.

title: WAT KHUNARAM
description: Wat Khunaram in Koh Samui is famous for its mummified monk, a revered Buddhist site reflecting Thailand’s spiritual traditions.

title: WAT LAMAI
description: Wat Lamai in Koh Samui is a local temple and cultural center, featuring Buddhist relics and a small history museum.

title: WAT PHRA CHEDI
description: Wat Phra Chedi in Koh Samui is a unique temple known for its ancient pagoda, peaceful surroundings, and cultural significance.
